name: .BINARY File Extension
summary: Learn about .BINARY files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open a BINARY file with PC Building Simulator (Windows). To do so, place the file in PC Building Simulator's Saves directory. Then, open PC Building Simulator and load the saved game your BINARY file contains.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
